segments.text: It's too raw . I wanted mine well done , but this one here is almost medium .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry you didn't enjoy it , sir . I will return it to the kitchen and bring you one that is well cooked . How is your steak this time , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . It's done just right this time , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am glad you enjoy it . I will tell this to the chef . Would you like some more beer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please give me another Calsberg .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I bring you some dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I've had enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about some coffee or tea then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will have a cup of coffee .
segments.speaker: S2
